org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.metadata
Interface Definition

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement, DefinitionCore, Metadata, MetadataControl, java.io.Serializable
public interface Definition
extends DefinitionCore, Metadata, java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement, java.io.Serializable

This interface represents information and behaviours of definition. This information shall be used conjointly with the bean instances to provide configuration information for them in order to be executed or instantiated. Moreover, definition could be used to embed in Method or Field so as to provide adscititious information for them. Key of definition is an object that is interpreted of (Class, Method, Field, Annotation, ...) and its value is an corresponding AnnoMeta object that is generated by container.

Moreover, this interface is extended from AnnotatedElement interface so it provides totally the same behaviors as the Annotation.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Metadata, AnnotatedElement

Method Detail

getOwnerClass

java.lang.Class<?> getOwnerClass()
Returns the owner class of this Definition. In case of current Definition is interpreted of Constructors, Methods or Fields, the returned object class will be the declaring class of them.

getAllAnnotatedFields

java.util.Set<java.lang.reflect.Field> getAllAnnotatedFields()
Returns an array containing Field objects representing all the fields that are annotated with any annotation.

Returns:
Returns an array containing Field objects if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getAllAnnotatedMethods

java.util.Set<java.lang.reflect.Method> getAllAnnotatedMethods()
Returns an array containing Method objects representing all the methods that are annotated with any annotation.

Returns:
Returns an array containing Method objects if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getAllAnnotatedConstructors

java.util.Set<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> getAllAnnotatedConstructors()
Returns an array containing Constructor objects representing all the constructors that are annotated with any annotation.

getAllMethodsAnnotatedParameter

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Method> getAllMethodsAnnotatedParameter()
Returns an array containing Method objects representing all the methods that have at least one parameter annotated with any annotation.

Note: in case of non-object-class Definition (Definition is interpreted of Method or Field or Constructor, and is not interpreted of object class), the returned value is null.

Returns:
Returns an array containing Method objects if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getAllConstructorsAnnotatedParameter

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> getAllConstructorsAnnotatedParameter()
Returns an array containing Constructor objects representing all the methods that have at least one parameter annotated with any annotation.

Note: in case of non-object-class Definition (Definition is interpreted of Method or Field or Constructor, and is not interpreted of object class), the returned value is null.

Returns:
Returns an array containing Constructor objects if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getArgsMemberDefinitions

Definition[] getArgsMemberDefinitions(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
Returns an array containing all member definitions of current Definition corresponding to parameters of given method.

Note: in case of non-object-class Definition (Definition is interpreted of Method or Field, and is not interpreted of object class), the returned value is null.

Parameters:
method - given method corresponds to current definition.
Returns:
returns an ArrayList containing definitions if it exists, otherwise returns an empty ArrayList.

getFieldsAnnotatedWith

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Field> getFieldsAnnotatedWith(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns all Field objects are annotated with given annotation.

Note: this method always returns null in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be null.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.
Returns:
returns an array containing all Field objects are annotated with given annotation if it exists, null otherwise.

getFieldsAnnotatedWith

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Field> getFieldsAnnotatedWith(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>... annotationClasses)
Returns all Field objects are annotated with given annotations.

Note: this method always returns null in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be null.

Parameters:
annotationClasses - the object classes corresponding to given annotations.
Returns:
returns an array containing all Field objects are annotated with given coressponding annotations if they exist, null otherwise.

getMemberDefinition

Definition getMemberDefinition(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
In case current definition is interpreted of object class in which given Field is declared, returns the corresponding member Definition of this Field.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

Parameters:
field - the given Field
Returns:
returns a Definition if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getMemberDefinition

Definition getMemberDefinition(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
In case current definition is interpreted of object class in which given Method is declared, returns the corresponding member Definition of this Method.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

Parameters:
method - the desired Method
Returns:
returns a Definition if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getMemberDefinition

Definition getMemberDefinition(java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?> constructor)
In case current Definition is interpreted of object class in which given Constructor is declared, returns the corresponding member Definition of this Constructor.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

Parameters:
constructor - the desired Constructor
Returns:
returns a Definition if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getMemberDefinition

Definition getMemberDefinition(java.lang.Object obj)
In case current definition is interpreted of the object class in which given object is declared, returns the corresponding member Definition of this object.

Note: the given object should be only Field or Method or Constructor.

Parameters:
obj - the desired object.
Returns:
returns a Definition if it exists, otherwise returns null.

getMemberDefinitionOfField

Definition[] getMemberDefinitionOfField(java.lang.String fieldName)
Returns an array containing member definitions corresponding to the field according to the given name.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of desired fields
Returns:
returns an array of definitions if they exist, otherwise returns null.

getMemberDefinitionOfMethod

Definition[] getMemberDefinitionOfMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                                         java.lang.Class<?>[] argsTypes)
Returns an array containing member definitions corresponding to the specified Method according to the given method name and argument types.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of Method
argsTypes - the specified parameter types of method. Indicates null in case desired method doesn't have any parameters.
Returns:
Returns an array containing member definitions if they exists, otherwise returns null.

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Method> getMethodsAnnotatedWith(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns all method objects are annotated with given annotation.

Note: this method always returns null in case current Definition is not interpreted of the object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be null.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.
Returns:
returns an array containing all Method objects are annotated with given annotation if it exists, null otherwise.

getMethodsAnnotatedWith

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Method> getMethodsAnnotatedWith(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>... annotationClasses)
Returns all method objects are annotated with given annotations.

Note: this method always returns null in case current Definition is not interpreted of the object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be null.

Parameters:
annotationClasses - the object classes corresponding to given annotations.
Returns:
returns an array containing all Method objects are annotated with given corresponding annotations if they exist, null otherwise.

isAnnotationPresent

boolean isAnnotationPresent()
Return true if this Definition is not an empty Definition. It means that there is at least one annotation annotated in current Definition (not includes member definition of its).

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyFields

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyFields()
Returns true if current Definition has at least one Field annotated with any annotation. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyFields

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyFields(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns true if given annotation is annotated with at least one Field of original object class which current Definition is interpreted of. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyMethods

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyMethods()
Returns true if current Definition has at least one Method annotated with any annotation. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of one object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyMethods

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyMethods(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns true if given annotation is annotated with at least one Method of original object class which current Definition is interpreted of. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyConstructors

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyConstructors()
Returns true if current Definition has at least one Constructor annotated with any annotation. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of one object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyConstructors

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyConstructors(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns true if given annotation is annotated with at least one Constructor of original object class which current Definition is interpreted of. Otherwise returns false.

Note: this method always returns false in case current Definition is not interpreted of object class. This means that if returned value of DefinitionCore.isInterpretedOfClass() method is false, returned value of this method will also be false.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyParameters

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyParameters()
Returns true in case current Definition has at least one method which also has at least one parameter annotated with any annotation, otherwise returned value will be false.

Note: the performance of this method is in the same way in all case current Definition is interpreted of object class or Method object or Constructor object.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyParameters

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyParameters(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns true in case current Definition has at least one method which also has at least one parameter annotated with the given annotation, otherwise returned value will be false.

Note: the performance of this method is in the same way in all case current Definition is interpreted of object class and Method object or Constructor object.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyWhere

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyWhere()
Returns true if there is at least one annotation is annotated at anywhere in current Definition (includes all member definition of it), otherwise returns false.

isAnnotationPresentAtAnyWhere

boolean isAnnotationPresentAtAnyWhere(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
Returns true if given annotation is annotated at anywhere in current Definition (includes all member definition of it), otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
annotationClass - the object class of given annotation.

setVisitor

void setVisitor(IAnnotationVisitor visitor)
Sets the visitor.

Parameters:
visitor - the visitor
